search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Typefully (typefully.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Typefully is: [https://typefully.com/pricing](https://typefully.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Creators love Typefully
-----------------------

### 190,000+ creators and teams chose Typefully to write and schedule their social media posts.

[![Image 22: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/marc_louvion)](https://x.com/marc_louvion)

Marc Lou@marc\_louvion

0 → 20,000 followers on LinkedIn in 1 year. I just cross-posted my tweets using [@typefully](https://twitter.com/typefully)

[![Image 23: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/FonsMans)](https://x.com/FonsMans)

Fons Mans@FonsMans

If you're serious about growing on X, [@typefully](https://twitter.com/typefully) is an absolute must-have. I've been using it to: - Manage my channels in one place - Collaborate with my team - Enhance my writing through AI suggestions - Stay organised with analytics & scheduling Plus, the design is just 🤌

[![Image 24: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/jurrehoutkamp)](https://x.com/jurrehoutkamp)

Jurre Houtkamp@jurrehoutkamp

Typefully is fantastic and way too cheap for what you get. We’ve tried many alternatives at [@framer](https://twitter.com/framer) but nothing beats it. If you’re still tweeting from Twitter you’re wasting time.

[![Image 25: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/bart_hillerich)](https://x.com/bart_hillerich)

Bart@bart\_hillerich

Typefully's "Make it punchier" AI editor tool is consistently fantastic. Highly recommend for any marketers out there.

[![Image 26: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/marckohlbrugge)](https://x.com/marckohlbrugge)

Marc Köhlbrugge@marckohlbrugge

Tweeting more with [@typefully](https://twitter.com/typefully) these days. 🙈 Distraction-free ✍️ Write-only Twitter 🧵 Effortless threads 📈 Actionable metrics I recommend giving it a shot.

[![Image 27: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/huevsite_x)](https://x.com/huevsite_x)

Huevsite In Public@huevsite\_x

Over the last 3 months with Typefully, here's the whirlwind transformation: 🚀 Posts skyrocketed by 1873% 📈 Impressions soared by 1252% 🔗 Profile clicks surged to 468 👥 Followers grew from 0 to 181

[![Image 28: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/madzadev)](https://x.com/madzadev)

Madza 👨‍💻⚡@madzadev

Today marks my 1 year posting streak with [@typefully](https://twitter.com/typefully) 🎉 Have discovered great people and opportunities! 🚀 One of the best decisions I've ever made! 👍

[![Image 29: Avatar](https://avatars.typefully.com/mikker)](https://x.com/mikker)

Mikkel Malmberg@mikker

If you'd like your posts to go to multiple twitters, [@typefully](https://twitter.com/typefully) is perfect. It's so good it's worth it for posting to even just one twitter.
